definition: residential surveillance, a form of noncustodial house arrest
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: Different kinds of surveillance can be used for surveillance of residence according to specific circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 監視居住可根據具體情況，採取不同的監視方式。

sentences.english: Seven are under house detention while another three are out on bail, the report said.
sentences.chinese: 報道說，有七人爲監視居住，另有三人取保候審。
